mean_en: a sound, especially when it is loud, unpleasant or disturbing; extra electrical or electronic signals that are not part of the signal that is being broadcast or transmitted and which may damage it; information that is not wanted and that can make it difficult for the important or useful information to be seen clearly
sentence: The machines outside are making a loud noise.
sentence_trans: 外面的机器发出了巨大的噪声。
